title: Break & enter
creator_credit: Amanda Brotchie, Melanie Coombs, XYZ Entertainment and Cinemedia Corporation
brief_description: A routine home invasion leads to a comedic exploration of gender and identity when a middle aged housewife swaps roles with the intruder who intended to rob her but was foiled by a frying pan. Cast includes Mark Peglar, Marion Heathfield and Robin Cummings with a music score by Mick Harvey.
